heading: Instructions for Data Producers (in draft)
paragraphs: As a data producer, you may have an interest in publishing your data at a NASA DAAC or NASA may require you to publish your data at a DAAC. Determining which of these data publication categories applies to you dictates your next step in the data publication process.
[Steps are in draft. They will be included below. Instructions will include a link to the Forms. NOTE: For testing, the link is in Task 2: Select DAAC.]
